```{r}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
```

```{r}
# Step 1: Define a grid of 6 pi values
grid_data <- data.frame(pi_grid = seq(from = 0, to = 1, length = 6))
```

```{r}
# Step 2: Evaluate the prior & likelihood at each pi
grid_data <- grid_data %>% 
  mutate(prior = dbeta(pi_grid, 2, 2),
         likelihood = dbinom(9, 10, pi_grid))
```
